You can make a game on playing cards.
Cut pictures on cards with 2-cards each. The children will then have to match up the pictures. Once a person holds 4 pieces of cards he scores a point. And that is how the game starts.
You can hang the playing cards that you have lost and keep counting to 101 before taking it off.
You can even make a mini book using playing cards and bind it as a book. Write a good story around it.
As mentioned above you can use it to bind mini books.
